name: Stories in the Stars
description:
Stories in the Stars

A man looks to the night sky to remember his father... Connect the constellations and find the story in the stars.

*

Gregory Blomquist - Game Designer, Writer, Level Designer, Audio

Cory Rupert - Game Designer, Lead Programmer, Artist, Audio

*

Main theme: "Lonely Winter" by Audiobinger
